<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Desiccating Inhalation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3530) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 53</row>

**Archetype** [Mummy](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=180)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Mummy Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3520)

</column>

---

You draw in the moisture from nearby creatures, draining them dry to heal your wounds. Creatures in a 30-foot cone take 6d8 negative damage, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save against your class DC. A creature that critically fails this saving throw is also [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10). As long as at least one creature was damaged by your Desiccating Inhalation, you regain HP equal to your level.

 At 14th level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d8.
name: Desiccating Inhalation
